Uses of Class
org.kiji.schema.security.KijiPermissions

Packages that use KijiPermissions
org.kiji.schema.security Kiji security. 
 

Uses of KijiPermissions in org.kiji.schema.security
 

Methods in org.kiji.schema.security that return KijiPermissions
 KijiPermissions KijiPermissions.addAction(KijiPermissions.Action action)
          Constructs a new KijiPermissions object with the specified action added to the current permissions.
static KijiPermissions KijiPermissions.emptyPermissions()
          Constructs a new KijiPermissions with no permitted actions.
 KijiPermissions KijiSecurityManager.getPermissions(KijiUser user)
          Gets the permissions for a user on this Kiji instance, as stored in the system table.
static KijiPermissions KijiPermissions.newWithActions(Set<KijiPermissions.Action> actions)
          Constructs a new KijiPermissions with the specified actions.
 KijiPermissions KijiPermissions.removeAction(KijiPermissions.Action action)
          Constructs a new KijiPermissions object with the specified action removed from the current permissions.
